question:
Consider the following authorities:
  1. National Biosafety Authority (NBA)
  2. Biotechnology Regulatory Authority of India (BRAI)
  3. Agricultural and Processed Food Products Export Development Authority (APEDA)
Which of the above has/have been established under the Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare?
explanation: Agricultural and Processed Food Products Export Development Authority (APEDA) is a body established under the Ministry of Commerce and Industry. National Biosafety Authority (NBA) and Biotechnology Regulatory Authority of India (BRAI) are proposed bodies and have not been established till now.
